ygData.subject: Re: New to the List )
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The FS Rapier has the same speed as the dirk, but one less damage.  If you can t find a dirk, the FS rapier is a good weapon, as it only cost me 7 pp. The
ygData.messageBody:
>>Should I start using the Dragoon dirk as my primary weapon to gain peirce
>>skill or should I invest in a FS rapier instead??


The FS Rapier has the same speed as the dirk, but one less damage. If you
can't find a dirk, the FS rapier is a good weapon, as it only cost me 7 pp.
The
best cheap weapon to get your skill up with is a FS dagger, at 19 delay, you
get more skill checks to get skill raises with. I can't imagine this
costing more
than 2 pp. This is from pc's not from the NPC's, they charge combine prices
for them.

>
>================================
>Unless you plan to use TWO piercing weapons, or unless you just HAVE to
have
>the "car antenna" look, totally forget about the FS Rapier. NEVER buy one.
>It is inferior to the Dragoon Dirk, and is MUCH more expensive, too. I was
>given a FS Rapier in trade, which you can buy from the vendor for approx
>280pp. Well, I tried to sell it for 100pp, and EVERYONE laughed at me.
>Looking at the stats... yes... a Dragoon Dirk IS better, and you can get
one
>of those for 20-40pp. So, forget about it. Really. Honestly. Unless you
want
>the look, or want to use 2 piercers.



NEVER buy those from vendors, players sell them for less than their regular
steel equivalents. I was carrying a steel rapier (I love the 3 musketeers
rapier + parrying dagger look), and saw an auction for a FS rapier, I
offered
7 pp, got it, and sold my regular one back for 11.5pp.

Don't confuse FS weapons with Well Balanced weapons, FS aren't magical.

Tindayen, Bard of the 16th level who is battle ready again!
(after the tragic loss of all his gear)
